item.title: Ways To Decode A Cipher ðŸ”
item.description:
Scenario

Determine number of possible ways to decode a given Caeser cipher encoded message that maps:
‘A’ -> ‘1’
‘B’ -> ‘2’
…
‘Z’ -> ‘26’
The input is a string of n numbers and the output is a number counting all the possible ways a message could be decoded…

item.title: About bobbys-dev
item.description: I’m a May 2020 graduate of Texas State University with a Master’s in Computer Science. I have a passion for engineering and data-driven work, and I’m actively looking for a role where I can build a data engineering and analytics career. While my background has primarily been hardware development, I’ve decided to shift into software oriented work to become more effective in a “big data” world. The focus of my studies at Texas State University was on data-driven research methods and software implementations.

item.title: Hello World
item.description: This blog lets you know what I’m up to. Start at the About for a summary about me.
